H0.text: Who wrote Fantasia on a Theme by Thomas Tallis . Edward Elgar

H1.text: Who wrote Fantasia on a Theme by Thomas Tallis . Gustav Holst

H2.text: Who wrote Fantasia on a Theme by Thomas Tallis . Frederick Delius

H3.text: Who wrote Fantasia on a Theme by Thomas Tallis . Vaughn Williams

A4.text: Fantasia on a Theme by Thomas Tallis, also known as the Tallis Fantasia, is a one-movement work for string orchestra by Ralph Vaughan Williams.

A5.text: He composed what his biographer James Day calls 'unquestionably the first work by Vaughan Williams that is recognizably and unmistakably his and no one else's'.
